SEARCH
Package pingPongGame.controller.components

Class BallController

java.lang.Object
pingPongGame.controller.components.BallController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class BallController extends Object implements Runnable
The BallController class manages the ball logic in the game. It implements the Runnable interface for multi-threading.

  • Constructor Summary

    BallController()
    Constructs a new BallController with a new BallModel instance.
